name: NBA 2K15
notes:
- If playing with a xbox 360 controller the dpad shows up as a player in the team selection screen (although the dpad works fine in the game). 

- One of the players wasd for controllers (and is the default selected) when choosing sides.
content:
game:
  appid: 282350
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win64
    description: Installing VisualC++ Runtime vcrun2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dsound
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  x360ce-path: $GAMEDIR
  x360ce-xinput9: true
